surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical features and surgical outcome of the traumatic hematomas posterior cranial fossa .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討外傷性後顱窩血腫的臨牀特徵和手術療效。

sentences.english: The absence of the fetal cranial vault in anencephaly is shown here.
sentences.chinese: 無腦兒顯示胎兒顱穹窿缺陷。

sentences.english: Anencephaly is absence of the fetal cranial vault.
sentences.chinese: 無腦兒是胎兒顱穹窿缺陷。

sentences.english: Cystic cerebellar astrocytoma comprises about 33% of all posterior fossa tumors in children.
sentences.chinese: 囊性星形細胞瘤佔兒童後顱窩腫瘤的33%。

sentences.english: This is the fifth, or trigeminal, cranial nerve.
sentences.chinese: 這是第五次，或三叉神經，顱神經。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment of traumatic posterior fossa extradural hematoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討外傷性後顱窩硬膜外血腫的診斷與治療。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnostic and therapeutic features of traumatic hematoma of the posterior fossa.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析總結外傷性後顱窩血腫的診斷和治療特點。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the curative effect of craniotomy on posterior fossa epidural hematoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討骨瓣開顱術治療後顱窩硬膜外血腫的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To study absorbed mechanism of free bone auto-graft in cranium.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱頂部自體骨遊離移植被吸收的內在機制。

sentences.english: Malformation of the craniocervical region, also known as malformation of the foramen magnum region, relates to many diseases.
sentences.chinese: 顱頸部畸形叉稱枕骨大孔區畸形，涉及的疾病較多。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the techniques and materials of dural closure and reconstruction of posterior fossa.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價後顱窩手術中硬腦膜重建的材料和方法。

sentences.english: Methods 39 patients underwent the examination of transcranial Doppler ultrasound .
sentences.chinese: 方法39例糖尿病患者進行經顱多普勒檢查。

sentences.english: Tumors in the posterior fossa are considered some of the most critical brain lesions.
sentences.chinese: 後顱窩腫瘤是非常嚴重的病變。
